Key Match Events: A critical error in the Tigers' Game 1 loss was reversed to an RBI double by Jose Ramirez, leading to the Guardians' five-run first inning and a 7-0 victory
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch and players expressed disappointment over the loss and the critical error
McKinstry admitted he wasn't prepared for the unusual hop due to field watering
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game's outcome was influenced by a scoring change and field conditions affected by irregular watering
The Tigers' season ended with a loss in the ALDS
